input.sentences: we had a bunch of friends over to see our new place .
we hung out on the couches .
some people got more comfortable than others .
this man had something in his ear as he sat on the chair .
we all got a good laugh .
output.sentences: There's nothing we love more than to have a friend get together.
We just listen to everything we have to share while we all sit on the couches
We like to get comfortable as we are all the best of friends.
Some of s try to listen more by pulling our ear open a little more.
It is nice to have them all in the same room to share all our favorite moments of life.
